Class BoundaryStrings

java.lang.Object
Utils.BoundaryStrings
public class BoundaryStrings extends Object
Utility class that holds reusable ASCII banners and stylized strings for console display. Commonly used across different boundary classes to present menus, headers, or exit messages.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    BYE_LOGO
    Stylized ASCII farewell banner displayed when the user exits the program.
    static final String
    footer
    Footer message displaying the system version in a stylized yellow format.
    static final String
    logo
    ASCII art logo of the system, typically used as a main menu banner.
